content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.Compare dominant-party or one-party systems in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries. In your response, you should do the following:Define dominant-party system.Describe two different examples of dominant-party or one-party systems used by different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.Explain how dominant-party or one-party systems can influence representation for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in (b).

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
